data.text: W To avoid environmental and health problems due to hazardous substances, appliances and rechargeable and non-rechargeable batteries marked with one of these symbols must not be disposed of with unsorted municipal waste. Always dispose of electrical and electronic products and, where applicable, rechargeable and non-rechargeable batteries, at an appropriate official recycling/collection point. GB DE FR NL IT ES PT DK SE NO FI RU CZ SK PL HR SI GR HU TR RO BG AE
data.question: Where do I dispose the machine?
